S

setAILevel(byte) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Cons.Enemy
Sets the enemy's AI level (0-2) 0 = random move 1 = uses players weakness to decide best move 2 = uses players health to decide best move if bigger than 2, it will be set to 2
setAILevel(AIID) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Cons.Enemy
Enum version if bigger than 2, it will be set to 2
setAttackGrowthRate(double) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Required.Player

setGraphic(Graphic) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Cons.Move
Sets the move's graphic
setHeathGrowthRate(double) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Required.Player
Sets the charater's growth rate for stats
Used in this formula (growth-rate x level)/10 + random(2)
Negative values will slowly decrease the stats, until it begins to apply negative ones.

Use(int, Player, Enemy, Companion[]) - Method in class coolninja.rpg.Cons.Move
